    A

    AbnormalUsageAlertUI - Class in Unnamed Package
    A themed Swing window that displays abnormal usage alerts produced by AlertCenter.
    AbnormalUsageAlertUI() - Constructor for class AbnormalUsageAlertUI
    Constructs the alert window, applies the WaterTheme styling, and loads the current alerts.
    ACCENT_BLUE - Static variable in class WaterTheme
    Lighter accent blue used in gradients and highlights.
    accessSystem() - Static method in class WaterMeterAccess
    Prompts for a Water Meter ID, validates it, and prints an access result.
    addHighUsage(String, double, double) - Static method in class AlertCenter
    Adds a HIGH_USAGE alert for the given meter.
    addLowUsage(String, double, double) - Static method in class AlertCenter
    Adds a LOW_USAGE alert for the given meter.
    addUsageRecord(String, LocalDate, double) - Method in class WaterUsageMonitor
    Adds a new usage record to the system.
    Alert - Class in Unnamed Package
    Represents an alert for abnormal usage patterns (e.g., high consumption, leak).
    Alert(String, String, String) - Constructor for class Alert
    Creates a new alert with an auto-assigned ID and today's date.
    AlertCenter - Class in Unnamed Package
    Centralized utility for recording, formatting, and clearing abnormal usage alerts (e.g., water consumption) for smart meters.
